pageContext.claim: “VIDEO: Islamist mob pushes teenage boy off roof and beats him to death!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tweeted a 2013 video, shared by the the far-right activist group Britain First, showing a young man was pushed from the roof of a building in Alexandria, Egypt, during the violence that followed the overthrow of President Mohamed Morsi. Mahmoud Ramadan, accused of the crime, was hanged for the murder in 2015.
